Package br.com.concepting.framework.mail

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.mail.Mail
  • public class Mail
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to manipulate the mail services.

      • retrieve

        public java.util.Collection<MailMessage> retrieve​(java.lang.String folderName)
                                           throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        Retrieves all messages from a specific inbox.
        Parameters:
        folderName - String that contains the inbox identifier.
        Returns:
        List that contains the messages.
        Throws:
        jakarta.mail.MessagingException - Occurs when was not possible to read/parse a message.
        java.io.IOException - Occurs when was not possible to connect into the inbox.

      • retrieve

        public java.util.Collection<MailMessage> retrieve​(java.lang.String folderName,
                                                  boolean onlyUnread)
                                           throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        Retrieves messages from a specific inbox.
        Parameters:
        folderName - String that contains the inbox identifier.
        onlyUnread - True/False.
        Returns:
        List that contains the messages.
        Throws:
        jakarta.mail.MessagingException - Occurs when was not possible to read/parse a message.
        java.io.IOException - Occurs when was not possible to connect into the inbox.
